Title: THE LONG DARK
Genre: Simulation - FPP - Survival
Works on: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10)
Languages: Audio and text: English. Text only: Deutsch, Ñ€ÑƒÑÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹

Company: Hinterland Studio Inc / Hinterland Studio Inc
Rating: ESRB Rating: Teen
Store page: http://www.gog.com/game/the_long_dark

About:
The Long Dark is a thoughtful, exploration-survival experience that challenges solo players to think for themselves as they explore an expansive frozen wilderness. There are no zombies -- only you, the cold, and everything Mother Nature can throw at you.
There is no hand holding! The game challenges players to think for themselves by providing the information but never the answers. You have to earn the right to survive.
The first part of Story Modeâ€™s Season One launches in Spring 2016, with the entirety of Season One being released episodically over the remainder of 2016. Players will take on the dual roles of bush pilot Will Mackenzie, and doctor Astrid Greenwood, as they both struggle to survive the aftermath of the â€œFirst Flareâ€ event, which has brought modern civilization to its knees.
Read More: http://hinterlandgames.com/the-long-dark-story-mode-teaser/
Monitor your Calorie count, Hunger and Thirst, Fatigue, and Body Temperature.
Over 30 square kms of wilderness to explore with dynamic weather, wildlife and time-of-day.
Collect over 100 gear items and learn how to hunt, harvest, craft, build fires and live off of the land on a quest for survival.

Minimum system requirements - Windows: XP / Vista/ 7 / 8 / 10 
Processor: Dual-Core Inte i5 CPU @ 2GHz+ 
Memory: 4 GB RAM 
Graphics: Intel 4xxx Series w/ 512MB VRAM or better 
Storage: 1 GB available space 
Sound Card: Any on-board chip will work. 
Mouse, Keyboard

Recommended system requirements - Windows: XP / Vista/ 7 / 8 / 10 
Processor: Intel i7 CPU @ 2.6GHz or higher 
Memory: 8 GB RAM 
Graphics: nVidia GTX 555 w/ 1GB VRAM or better 
Storage: 1 GB available space 
Sound Card: Ideally, something with Surround capabilities. 
Mouse, Keyboard
